title: Trump Asked Comey to End Flynn Probe, Gave Russians Intel: A Closer Look | Sen. Ben Sasse
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the White House playing damage control after bombshell reports about President Trump sharing classified info with Russia and asking the FBI to drop investigations into his former National Security Advisor.  (0:21)
Then, Senator Ben Sasse gives his big-picture opinion about reports that President Trump may have shared classified info with the Russian foreign minister and ambassador. He also expresses his views about rebuilding public trust in government, what he thinks Donald Trump should be focusing on, and the future of Russia's cyber attacks. (12:19)
Sen. Sasse and Late Night producer Henry Melcher then discuss more about the senator's real public safety objective. (22:04)
